item.title: Playing Between Unix Time and Human Readable Time in Php
item.description: Unix time is widely used in unix-like operatin system to track down the total seconds. PHP provides some easy way to convert between Unix Time and Human Time, let’s first look at the date() function. date() formats a local time/date according to its parameter format. {% blockquote Wikipedia %} Unix time (aka POSIX time or Epoch time), is a system for describing instants in time, defined as the number of seconds that have elapsed since 00:00:00 Coordinated Universal Time (UTC), Thursday, 1 January 1970, not counting leap second.
